text: The curtain rises over the 64th Cannes Film Festival and the stars emerge.
Hollywood icon, Robert de Niro, heads the six-member awards jury.
Bollywood actress, Mallika Sherawat, says Indian actors received more attention this year.
"Unlawful Killing" features a still secret paparazzi photograph of Princess Diana's last moments.
The British entry, "We Need to Talk About Kevin," makes its debut.
Angelina Jolie, Jack Black and Dustin Hoffman...
...display their talents in the animated comedy, "Kung Fu Panda 2."
